import {Component} from 'react' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import Loader from 'react-loader-spinner' // eslint-disable-next-line import/no-extraneous-dependencies import {v4} from 'uuid' import CreditDebit from '../UserLastTransaction' import DetailsPage from '../UserDetailsPages' import './index.css' const apiStatusConstants = { initial: 'INITIAL', success: 'SUCCESS', failure: 'FAILURE', inProgress: 'IN_PROGRESS', } let newId = 1 const allPages = [ { id: 1, BlueImageUrl: 'https://hmp.me/d6r2', NormalImageUrl: 'https://hmp.me/d6u3', text: 'Dashboard', link: `/user/:id`, }, { id: 2, BlueImageUrl: 'https://hmp.me/d6u6', NormalImageUrl: 'https://hmp.me/d6u5', text: 'All Transactions', link: `/transaction`, }, { id: 3, BlueImageUrl: 'https://hmp.me/d6u8', NormalImageUrl: 'https://hmp.me/d6u7', text: 'Profile', link: `/profile`, }, ] class UserDashBoard extends Component { state = { totalTransactions: [], debit: 0, credit: 0, activeId: allPages[0].id, apiStatus: apiStatusConstants.initial, } componentDidMount() { this.getCreditsTotal() } getCreditsTotal = async () => { this.setState({ apiStatus: apiStatusConstants.inProgress, }) const {match} = this.props console.log(match) const {params} = match const {id} = params newId = id console.log('mani kum', id) const url = 'https://bursting-gelding-24.hasura.app/api/rest/daywise-totals-7-days' const options = { method: 'GET', headers: { 'content-type': 'application/json', 'x-hasura-admin-secret': 'g08A3qQy00y8yFDq3y6N1ZQnhOPOa4msdie5EtKS1hFStar01JzPKrtKEzYY2BtF', 'x-hasura-role': 'user', 'x-hasura-user-id': 1, }, } const response = await fetch(url, options) if (response.ok) { const jsonData = await response.json() console.log('mani', jsonData) const newData = jsonData.last_7_days_transactions_credit_debit_totals.map( eachItem => ({ id: v4(), sum: eachItem.sum, type: eachItem.type, }), ) let totalDebit = 0 let totalCredit = 0 newData.forEach(item => { if (item.type === 'debit') { totalDebit += item.sum } else if (item.type === 'credit') { totalCredit += item.sum } }) console.log('Total Debit:', totalDebit) console.log('Total Credit:', totalCredit) this.setState({ totalTransactions: newData.slice(0, 3), debit: totalDebit, credit: totalCredit, apiStatus: apiStatusConstants.success, }) } if (response.status === 404) { this.setState({ apiStatus: apiStatusConstants.failure, }) } } renderLoadingView = () => (
) renderFailureView = () => (

Not Found

) renderTransactionView = () => { const {debit, credit, totalTransactions} = this.state return ( <>

Accounts

${credit.toFixed(2).replace(/\d(?=(\d{3})+\.)/g, '$&,')}

Credit

${debit.toFixed(2).replace(/\d(?=(\d{3})+\.)/g, '$&,')}

Fri

) } renderAllTransactionView = () => { const {apiStatus} = this.state console.log('api mani', apiStatus) switch (apiStatus) { case apiStatusConstants.success: return this.renderTransactionView() case apiStatusConstants.failure: return this.renderFailureView() case apiStatusConstants.inProgress: return this.renderLoadingView() default: return null } } onChangePageView = id => { this.setState({activeId: id}) } render() { const {activeId} = this.state return (

Money Matters

    {allPages.map(eachItem => ( ))}

Rhye

olivia@untitledui.com

{this.renderTransactionView()}
) } } export default UserDashBoard
